channel.title: principle on JavaIsland
channel.description: Recent content in principle on JavaIsland

item.title: ReentrantLock implementation principle
item.description: When using synchronize to do synchronization, lock acquisition and release are implicitly implemented by compiling and adding different machine instructions to achieve the principle. ReentrantLock is a class based on AbstractQueuedSynchronizer(AQS for short) implementation, this article analyzes the implementation principle of ReentrantLock, I hope it will be helpful to you. ReentrantLock: a thread can still repeat the lock after it has obtained it, and will not appear to block itself.
